section.heading: Exemptions—Sales of cigarettes by Indian retailers

content.p: Print RCWs > Title 82 > Chapter 82.08 > Section 82.08.0316 82.08.0315 << 82.08.0316 >> 82.08.0317 PDF RCW 82.08.0316 Exemptions — Sales of cigarettes by Indian retailers. The tax levied by RCW 82.08.020 does not apply to sales of cigarettes by an Indian retailer during the effective period of a cigarette tax contract subject to RCW 43.06.455 or a cigarette tax agreement under RCW 43.06.465 or 43.06.466 . [ 2008 c 228 s 3 ; 2005 c 11 s 3 ; 2001 c 235 s 4 .] NOTES: Authorization for agreement — Effective date — 2008 c 228: See notes following RCW 43.06.466 . Findings — Intent — Explanatory statement — Effective date — 2005 c 11: See notes following RCW 43.06.465 . Intent — Finding — 2001 c 235: See RCW 43.06.450 .
